```{r}
library(here)
fertilizer <- read_csv(here::here("data", "tidytuesday","data","2020","2020-09-01",
                         "cereal_crop_yield_vs_fertilizer_application.csv"))
```

```{r}
glimpse(fertilizer)
```

```{r}
ggplot(fertilizer, aes(y =`Nitrogen fertilizer use (kilograms per hectare)`, x = Year)) + geom_point()
```
